basic_attack.descriptionKey: Basic Attack varies based on a weapon choice.

active_skill.descriptionKey: Active Skill varies based on a weapon choice.

passive_skill.descriptionKey: Your MC and Him each have their own Passive Skill

support_skill.descriptionKey: Click to check his Support Skill for that companion

resonance_skill.descriptionKey: Click to check specifics of Resonance Skill for that companion

ardent_oath.descriptionKey: Click to check specifics of Ardent Oath for that companion. Oath is your Ultimate Ability.

perfect_dodge.descriptionKey: You can trigger it when dodging right before the enemy attacks you. It activates Support Skill even if its cooldown is not up yet.

oath_recovery.descriptionKey: A β Protocore that fastens your ultimate recovery(Oath). Can make you use your Oath two times during the battle instead of one

expedited_energy.descriptionKey: A β Protocore that fastens your special energy ◆ recovery. The faster you regenerate them the faster you will be able to use your Resonance Skill and Active Skill again.

dmg_to_weakened.descriptionKey: A δ Protocore that boosts damage taken on weakened enemies, i.e. enemies with broken shields.

crit_dmg.descriptionKey: A δ Protocore that increases your CRIT DMG. It is used to multiply your damage on finale CRIT DMG number percentage. It will apply if you 'crit' i.e. your CRIT Rate is enough to happen.クリティカル攻撃

crit_rate.descriptionKey: A δ Protocore that increases your CRIT Rate. It shows the ratio of possible crit multiply. E.g. 50% means there is 1 out of 2 chances to multiply your damage by CRIT DMG you have.

stellactrum_match.descriptionKey: Each card has its color. On each stage there's a color requirment. When you match all the colors, your Resonance Skill will be able to destroy 2 layers of enemy's shield instead of 1 磁場星譜:完全マッチング.

mc.descriptionKey: Main Character, in other words, You!

aoe.descriptionKey: Area of Effect: an ability that affects enemies in the radius

hunter_firearm.descriptionKey: A weapon from Standard Hunter Series.

flame_lily.descriptionKey: Artis's special ability. Different Skills summon them, activating buffs.

scarlet_shade.descriptionKey: Artis's Support Skill. It creates Flame Lilies

tinctus.descriptionKey: Fresh Paint's special ability. Inflict Tinctus to get buffs.

reprise.descriptionKey: Phantom Of The Siren's special ability. Reprise is summoned by Support Skill.

echo.descriptionKey: Phantom Of The Siren's special ability. Echo is a part of his Passive Skill.

aria.descriptionKey: Phantom Of The Siren's Support Skill.

fishtail_beacon.descriptionKey: Abysswalker's special ability. It is a part of his Support Skill. Restores 2 Potential

potential.descriptionKey: Abysswalker's special ability. It has 6 stacks, check them under MC's HP bar.

beacon.descriptionKey: Abysswalker's special ability. It is a part of his Passive Skill. Restores 1 Potential

deepsea_pursuit.descriptionKey: CRIT Rate buff that appears at full Potential stacks.

searing_slash.descriptionKey: Rafayel's special attack that is triggered at full Potential stacks.

sea_spirit.descriptionKey: 潮汐の神固有の特殊召喚物です。ホムラとMCのパッシブスキルで召喚でき、レベルが3段階存在します。

heavenly_rain.descriptionKey: 潮汐の神固有の特殊効果です。信仰ゲージが満タンになると発動し、味方の与ダメージを30%増加させ、全ての海霊のレベルを1上昇させます。

faith.descriptionKey: 潮汐の神固有のゲージです。MCのHPバーの下に表示されます。自身、ホムラ、海霊の攻撃が命中することで溜まります。

tidal_field.descriptionKey: 潮汐の神固有のフィールド効果です。アクティブスキル「潮汐」で生成され、その中にいることで会心率が上昇する潮汐の力を獲得できます。

surging_tides.descriptionKey: 潮汐の神の共鳴スキルです。ホムラと共に大波を起こし、攻撃力と最大HPに基づくダメージを与えます。

sea_god_mark.descriptionKey: リモリアの海神固有の特殊バフです。時間経過で再チャージされ、重撃で消費してダメージを強化できます。「神の眷属」状態中は特に強力です。

ocean_descent.descriptionKey: リモリアの海神固有の特殊バフです。HPバーの下にある専用ゲージです。自身の攻撃で左側を、ホムラのパッシブスキルで右側を溜めます。満タンで「神の眷属」状態へ移行できます。

divine_favor.descriptionKey: リモリアの海神の強力な強化状態です。「海溝の降臨」ゲージ満タンで発動でき、「海神の印」とアクティブスキルが強化され、「雷晶」を生成します。

lightning_tide.descriptionKey: 「神の眷属」状態中に「雷晶」を起爆させると発生する追加ダメージ効果です。

lightning_crystal.descriptionKey: リモリアの海神固有の特殊バフです。「神の眷属」状態中にアクティブスキルを使うと出現する特殊オブジェクトです。中へ回避することで起爆し、範囲ダメージとエネルギー回復をもたらします。

hunters_intention.descriptionKey: Hunter Sword's Passive Skill. Provides ATK buff

gathering_stacks.descriptionKey: Hunter Claymore's special ability. On 3 stacks greatly empoweres your Active Skill allowing to skip the charge stage.
